name: Harney Heritage – Herbal & Decaf Teabag Sampler Black Box
description:
Our elegant Herbal & Decaf Teabag Sampler comes filled with an assortment of 16 tea bags. Use it as an elegant teatime presentation piece or as a perfect office or host/hostess gift. Let us choose the flavors. They'll be sure to please. You may refill it again with any of our tea bags for years of enjoyment.
Each sampler contains two of the following teas: Decaf Ceylon, Decaf Earl Grey, Egyptian Chamomile, Lemon Herbal, Organic Ginger Turmeric, Organic Peppermint, Organic Rooibos, and Raspberry.

name: Garden Party
description: Garden Party is the winner of our 2021 Happy Blendings contest. Customers submitted blend ideas, and Garden Party ultimately received the most votes from all our customers. This blend is inspired by summer parties in lush English gardens. Fruit flavors blend together atop tart rhubarb and green tea. Enjoy!

name: Williamsburg Summer Afternoon Tea, Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
Delight in the pleasures of a summer afternoon in a timeless garden! These garden images are drawn from 18th-century botanical illustrations in our archives. They represent native Virginia flowers found in Colonial Williamsburg's carefully tended historic gardens. Your purchase of Williamsburg products supports the research, preservation, and educational programs of the non-profit Colonial Williamsburg Foundation.
Each tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or click here to explore ways to reuse your tins!
Click here to see all Colonial Williamsburg Foundation blends.

name: Amba Thieves Tea
description: Amba Thieves Tea is a handmade, brisk black tea with a storied past. Years ago, at the Amba Tea Estate, all tea had to go to the owners. However, some ladies plucked the tea and then made a crude and strong black tea in their hut. They were "thieves." This tea willingly accepts milk and sugar. You'll find it lovely and lively.

name: Matcha Okurimono Gift
description:
Every matcha fan on your gift list, and that includes you, deserves this lovely Matcha Okurimono set. The first reason is because “okurimono” means “gift” in Japanese. The second is that once you or your recipients open the beautiful box, they’ll discover all the necessary items required to prepare the perfect bowl of matcha (including instructions for preparation). Matcha gift shopping begins and ends here, with everything you need in one prepackaged place!
Each gift set includes:

 1 - Jobetsugi Ceremonial Matcha (Thin Grade) 30 g Tin

1 - Senjunomukashi Ceremonial Matcha (Thick Grade) 30 g Tin

 1 - Ceramic Matcha Bowl 13 oz (color may vary)

1 - Ceramic Matcha Whisk Stand

1 - Bamboo Matcha T-Whisk / 80 Prong (chasen)1 - Bamboo Matcha Scoop (chashaku)
 
Make sure to check out all our Matcha teas!

name: Harney Heritage – Organic Teabag Sampler Black Box
description:
An assortment of 16 certified organic tea bags in a classic black archive-style box with the Harney & Sons logo, makes an easy hostess gift to keep on hand, or a striking presentation for your own teatime. The sturdy box may be refilled with any of our tea bags for extended enjoyment.
 Each sampler contains two of the following teas: Organic Black, Organic Citron Green, Organic Earl Grey Supreme, Organic Ginger Turmeric, Organic Green, Organic Green with Citrus & Ginkgo, Organic Peppermint, and Organic Rooibos.

name: Unjonotomo Ceremonial Matcha (Extra Thick Grade)
description:
This is the cream of the crop. It is a ceremonial matcha reserved for special ceremonies.  This tea is grown along the banks of the Uji River, where the soil is rich. The tea plants are deeply shaded. The leaves are hand-picked while still young. Since it's only harvested once a season, the tea plant has the rest of the year to build up and make the best matcha next season. This cycle creates maximum umami levels. The tea is air-dried and ground by traditional stone mills. 
Make sure to check out all our Matcha teas!

name: Organic Gunpowder, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
When John Harney started in the tea trade over 30 years ago, there were just two green tea offerings from China: Gunpowder and Chun Mee. Though our selection has expanded greatly since then, many people are very familiar with and enjoy Gunpowder's sharp, charred flavor.
Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Organic Gunpowder.

name: Forlife Curve Mug with Infuser 15 oz (Multiple colors)
description:
Have your tea and drink it too. It's easy to enjoy your favorite brews wherever and whenever with the Curve Tea Mug by Forlife—it includes an extra-fine 0.3 mm gauge stainless steel infuser and lid that doubles as a holder for the infuser, making it easy to enjoy a superb brew with easy, no-fuss clean-up. The ceramic mug is microwave and dishwasher safe, but keep your infuser away from the microwave!

Capacity 15 oz.
Box dimensions (inches): 5.5h x 4.625w x  4.625d

name: Valentine's Day
description: Valentine's Day is our romantic brew of our Chocolate Black Tea blend with lovely pink rosebuds. Keep the romance alive and enjoy this special tea with your special someone throughout the year.

name: Murder on the Orient Express Blend, Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
What starts out as a lavish train ride through Europe quickly unfolds into one of the most stylish, suspenseful, and thrilling mysteries ever told. Discover this smoky and citrusy black tea inspired by the riveting tale.
Each tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or click here to explore ways to reuse your tins!

name: Harney & Sons Tea Chest – Loose Teas Signature Gift
description:
Our exclusive Harney & Sons tea chest makes an elegant gift for a tea lover or someone you are trying to 'convert' to tea. This beautiful box with our logo features a silver-plated strainer and four 2 oz. tins of our most popular loose teas: English Breakfast, Hot Cinnamon Spice, Earl Grey Supreme, and Paris. Refill the tins with our loose tea by the pound, or rotate in new ones, for years of enjoyment.
Each gift contains:
1 - Hot Cinnamon Spice 2 oz Tin
1 - English Breakfast 2 oz Tin

 1 - Earl Grey Supreme 2 oz Tin

1 - Paris 2 oz Tin
1 - Silver-plated strainer
 

 Dimensions (inches): 2.5h x 9w x 6.5d

name: Royal Pomegranate Green Tea, Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
Royal Pomegranate offers a light and layered blend of detoxifying green tea and antioxidant-rich pomegranate. Sweet notes of pomegranate puncture a soothing green tea, as in this aromatic elixir.
Each tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or click here to explore ways to reuse your tins!
Click here to explore The Met Collection.

name: Williamsburg Holiday Heritage Tea
description:
Bring home a taste of Colonial Williamsburg's grand illumination! A classic holiday tea with hints of citrus, cinnamon, and a dash of nostalgia. Your purchase of Williamsburg products supports the research, preservation, and educational programs of the non-profit Colonial Williamsburg Foundation.
Click here to see all Colonial Williamsburg Foundation Blends.

name: Black Cask Bourbon, HT Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
With our new Black Cask Bourbon, we set out to combine the full body and intense aromas of black tea with the rich flavors of finely aged bourbon. The result is simple and stunning: prominent bourbon notes of vanilla, caramel, and smoky oak cask layered atop a smoky black tea base. Perfect for sipping slow and steady, as a bourbon should be.
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Black Cask Bourbon.

name: Organic Ginger Turmeric, HT Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
Organic Ginger Turmeric is a potent blend of two powerhouse roots that are sure to become a staple in your tea cabinet. We've added apple, beetroot, and lemongrass to bring an extra touch of flavor to this ruby-colored brew. Warm and soothing when brewed hot, and refreshing when served iced, you will find a sense of tranquility in every cup.
Each HT tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or reuse it and refill it with one of our Bags of 50!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Organic Ginger Turmeric.

name: Jane's Garden Tea, Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
Gardens inspire by showing continual growth, renewal, and vitality; it also takes love, tenderness, and care to nurture a garden. It is in Jane's memory, as a lifelong friend and gardener, that Jane's Garden Tea was blended to show support during her battle against breast cancer. We are pleased to offer this rendition of green tea with pomegranate and roses, available as loose tea in our traditional black tin and also in a beautiful pink and green tin with 20 tea sachets.
One dollar ($1) of the proceeds from the sale of Jane's Garden tins will be shared by the Jane Lloyd Fund and the National Breast Cancer Foundation. This fund helps patients in Salisbury, CT, with their day-to-day expenses while battling cancer. The National Breast Cancer Foundation provides mammograms, education, and research about breast cancer nationwide.
Each tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or click here to explore ways to reuse your tins!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Jane's Garden Tea.

name: Tea Chest Featuring Eight Teas (Assorted)
description:
Our signature Tea Chest Featuring Eight Teas has become a classic gesture of hospitality for hosts and guests alike. We fill it with our choice of eight Wrapped Sachet flavors, 4 packets of each flavor (32 total). Be assured that our selection will be wonderful and well received. Use and refill the chest all the time, or it's easy to store it for annual traditions.
Each chest contains:

32 - Sachets (8 flavors, 4 of each flavor, pre-selected from our Individually Wrapped Sachet Collection).
 
Dimensions (inches): 2h x 16w x 9.25d

name: Organic Ginger Lemon, HT Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
Our Organic Ginger Lemon is simple and understated, yet full of warming flavors. It is perfect for enjoying anytime, from cloudy mornings and rainy afternoons to golden evenings in the cool. This tea combines the spicy and sweet notes of ginger and ginger root with a twist of lemon for brightness, creating a simple but full body that's easy to enjoy. Caffeine-free.
Each HT tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or reuse it and refill it with one of our Bags of 50!
Click here to see additional purchasing options of Organic Ginger Lemon.

name: Hemp Leaves
description:
Grown from the roots up in Millerton, NY these leaves are carefully cultivated by The Hemp Division, our sister company. Hemp leaves are nutrient-dense and contain beneficial endocannabinoids. Find your own path and discover a cool, calm and delicious experience like no other with.
Please note: This tea has a strong hemp aroma.

name: Wonderful Things: Mystery, Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
Dream World is an original lifestyle brand inspired by #1 New York Times best selling author and illustrator Emily Winfield Martin. It is a magical place full of wonder, where everyone belongs and any dream—ordinary or out of this world—can come true. Emily beautifully combines her classic, painterly style with inspirational and imaginative storytelling. Her lovely, dynamic, and captivating illustrated stories hold the key to unlocking a world of wonder for adults and children alike. Wonderful Things is a blend to celebrate all the wonderful moments that will come along with the child about to be born. This is the perfect treat for the parent-to-be at their baby shower or other celebration. Caffeine-free.
Each tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or click here to explore ways to reuse your tins!
Is your Wonderful Thing a Boy or a Girl? Click here.

name: Kagoshima Yutaka Midori
description: We aimed to provide a unique tea experience from Kagoshima, and our efforts have exceeded our expectations. Kagoshima is on the southern tip of Japan’s southern Kyushu Island. This is a blend of light and deep-steamed senchas made from the Yutaka Midori cultivar. Yutaka Midori means intensely green, and this tea delivers. The light steaming makes for a sweeter green tea.

name: King of Bai Mudan
description: On Mike's trip to Fuding, China, he looked at many producers of white tea. They are really innovating there nowadays. While there, he came upon this very special white tea and thought some people would enjoy it. It is even sweeter and has more body than our regular Mutan White (aka Bai Mudan).

name: Organic Hibiscus Ginger
description:
Tune up your immunity with an infusion specially designed to support your body's defenses. This organic brew combines flavors of tropical hibiscus, rosehips, apple, and powerful echinacea for an energetic, antioxidant-filled base. Add vitamin-rich lemon peel and soothing ginger root along with cooling eucalyptus, peppermint, and a sparkle of clove for a delicious tune-up. Caffeine-free.*
WARNING: Consult your healthcare provider prior to use if you are pregnant or nursing, taking any medication, or if you have a medical condition.
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA). This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

name: Ceramic Tea Canister
description:
This glazed, ceramic Zero Japan tea canister has a charming yet modern feel and will not rust or impart flavor. The food-safe interior allows for easy, sanitary clean-up. And its complete airtight design keeps moisture out and locks freshness in. Great for storing loose tea.
Please note: This item is not dishwasher-safe. Use only mild detergent and a sponge to clean.

Capacity 7 oz.
Made in Japan.

name: Iced Matcha Gift
description:
Ideal for the resident matcha addict, our Iced Matcha Gift is perfect for brightening up a day and staying cool in the heat. Each gift comes with everything you need to enjoy your very own iced matcha lattes, including a shaker, a perfect matcha scoop, and a 30 gram tin of our favorite Jobetsugi Ceremonial Matcha. Simply combine, shake, and enjoy! Excellent as a gift or to spice up your own Matcha-making experiences.
Each gift contains:

 1 - Jobetsugi Ceremonial Matcha (Thin Grade) 30 g. Tin

1 - Perfect Matcha Scoop
1 - Iced Matcha Shaker


 Please note: Use crushed ice.


Make sure to check out all our Matcha teas!

description:
Our elegant Harney Heritage Wrapped Sachet sampler comes filled with an assortment of 20 Individually Wrapped Sachets. Use it as an elegant teatime presentation piece or as a perfect office or host/hostess gift. Let us choose the flavors; they'll be sure to please. You may refill it again with any of our wrapped sachets for years of enjoyment.
Each sampler contains 20 teas, pre-selected from our Individually Wrapped Sachet Collection. Sampler includes green, black, herbal, flavored, and unflavored teas.

name: Mother's Day
description: Mother's Day is a beautiful and refreshing caffeine-free herbal blend created in honor of all mothers. Our tea sachets in the decorative tins make a thoughtful gift for Mom or the perfect choice if you are hosting a Mother's Day tea or luncheon. This tea was previously known as Mother's Bouquet.

name: Teasy Insulated Flask (Multiple Colors)
description:
Tea lovers, this one is for you. Teasy ® brings the Zen of the tea ceremony into your everyday life. Teasy makes tea drinking elegant, simple, and sensual, and it makes it easier than ever for you to enjoy specialty teas. This is the tea ceremony—liberated.
This is for you if you travel, if you drink tea everywhere you go, if you don’t love excess packaging, teabags, or takeaway cups, and if your tea sometimes overbrews or gets cold before you get a moment to truly enjoy it.

Keeps liquids warm or cold.
Capacity: 9 oz./300 ml. (approx.)
Temperature tolerance: 32°F to 212°F
Weight: 9.8 oz. (approx.)


Material: Insulated stainless steel (SUS304), high-borosilicate glass, silicone.
Cleaning: Hand wash in soapy, warm water.

Dimensions (inches): 6.7h x 2.75w x 2.75d (approx.)

name: Paris, Classic Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
Mike Harney has enjoyed many a pot of tea in the famous Parisian tea shops. In homage to the city, he created what's become one of Harney & Sons' most popular and beloved blends worldwide. Paris is a fruity black tea with vanilla and caramel flavors and a hint of lemony bergamot. The aroma is delightful!
Each Classic tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or reuse it and refill it with one of our Bags of 50!﻿
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Paris.

name: Matcha Whisk Stand (Assorted Colors)
description:
Matcha: A luxury, a necessary ritual, or both? When you're not frothing your matcha to perfection, leave your bamboo matcha whisk (or chasen) in the reliable (and metaphorical) hands of our elegant whisk stand. Designed to protect the whisk's tulip-shaped curves and keep the whisk's delicate fronds from damage, this whisk holder's streamlined design extends your chasen's life and offers an efficient, safe way to store your chasen between uses.
Please note: The Matcha Whisk is not included. If you're interested in also purchasing the whisk, click here.
Make sure to check out all our Matcha teas!

name: Irish Breakfast, Box of 50 Wrapped Teabags
description:
Our Irish Breakfast tea is 100% Assam, and like most traditional Irish blends, this is a great way to begin your morning. In contrast to other versions of Irish Breakfast tea, you could say ours is a little more sophisticated. It tastes great on its own or takes milk and sugar well. 
Each box contains 50 teabags.Each teabag brews one 6-8 oz. cup of tea.Each teabag is individually wrapped, making it perfect for travel or sharing with a friend!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Irish Breakfast.

name: Rose Scented, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
Rose Scented, our memorable blend of large leaf tea from China, is decorated with rose flavor and soft pink rosebuds. The fragrance alone makes this rose tea a provocative delight for the senses. In addition, the buds and petals throughout lend visual allure.
Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Rose Scented.

name: Nepalese Hand Rolled Tips
description: We have been enjoying the work of our friends at Jun Chiyabari. Emeric Harney visited there a few years ago. When they sent us this lovely tea, well, we just had to get it for you. The big leaves with tips are preserved by the hand-rolling process. This allows for a very special tea that is a bit reminiscent of a fine Darjeeling.

name: Indigo Punch, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
Vibrant and full of crisp, fruity flavors, our caffeine-free Indigo Punch combines the delicate tang of rose hips and apple pieces. The earthy tones of the gorgeous Butterfly Pea Flower make this a unique blend. Bright lemongrass, lemon peel, and vivid raspberry round out this beautiful brew, along with natural honey flavor for a touch of sweetness. 
 Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
Please note: The mineral content of your water source will affect the color of the brew. Our photos use local spring water sourced from the Berkshires. If the color of your brew is different, please consider trying an alternative water source.

name: Organic Rooibos Chai, Box of 20 Individually Wrapped Sachets
description:
Organic Rooibos Chai brings together caffeine-free ﻿Organic Rooibos, or "red bush" herbal from South Africa, with sweet Indian spices of clove, cardamom, and cinnamon. Savor this blend in soothing, soul-satisfying cups. The spices impart an earthy touch that will have you welcoming seconds. Certified Fair Trade. 
Each box contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each sachet is individually wrapped, making it perfect for travel or sharing with a friend!

name: Harney Heritage – Teabag Sampler Black Box
description:
Our elegant Harney Heritage Teabag sampler comes filled with an assortment of 15 teabags. Use it as an elegant teatime presentation piece or as a perfect office or hostess gift. Let us choose the flavors; they'll be sure to please. You may refill it again with any of our tea bags for years of enjoyment.
Each sampler contains 15 teas, pre-selected from our Foil-Wrapped Teabag Collection.

name: Organic Chun Mee
description: Organic Chun Mee is a traditional green summer tea from China with a lightly roasted vegetal taste. When John Harney started in the tea trade over 30 years ago, Chun Mee was one of only two green tea offerings from China, along with Gunpowder. Our offerings have greatly expanded since then, yet many people still enjoy Chun Mee's familiar taste.

name: Wellness Trio Gift
description:
Not sure where to start your wellness journey? Have a friend in mind who might be feeling the same? The Wellness Trio Gift is the key to discovering the world of wellness brews and the great effects they can impart on your mind, body, and soul.
Each gift contains:

 1 - Hemp Moringa 5. oz Tin

name: Yixing Tea Set (Assorted Styles)
description: For those who want to enjoy their tea as if they were seated in a charming Eastern tea house, we offer these Yixing clay tea sets. Elegant, these sets offer a unique sensory experience as well as the ability to be "seasoned" with your favorite tea. Prepare your tea in a Western method if you'd like, or experiment with Eastern Gongfu style, using more tea, shorter infusions, and multiple infusions to discover how your tea develops over each round. Learn more about this in our Chinese Tea Traditions blog post.Bamboo Tea Pot: 8 oz. capacity.Brown Side-Handled Pot: 6 oz. capacity.

name: Banting & Best Blend, Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
100 years ago, two Canadian scientists, Frederic Banting and Charles Best, discovered insulin and later sold their patent for $1 as their "gift to the world." Insulin regulates our blood sugar levels, but the price of insulin has skyrocketed for those who rely on the medication to stay alive. To honor their discovery, this naturally flavored black tea tastes sweet but has no sweetener. 50% of the proceeds will go to T1International.T1International believes in a world where everyone with type 1 diabetes, no matter where they live, has everything they need to survive and achieve their dreams. Approximations say that more than 40 million people around the world live with type 1 diabetes. A large proportion of people with diabetes live in places with inadequate or unaffordable healthcare, which means there are likely hundreds of thousands of people facing death due to a lack of insulin. We support local communities by giving them the tools they need to stand up for their rights so that access to insulin and diabetes supplies becomes a reality for all.
Each tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or click here to explore ways to reuse your tins! 
For more information please visit www.t1international.com

name: Ralph's American Breakfast, Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
Start your morning with Ralph's American Breakfast tea. A malty blend with hints of toasted hay, this rich brew evokes the essential warmth of home. Ralph Lauren developed this unique tea in collaboration with Harney & Sons. The handsome tin can be reused in the kitchen or den for a cheerful accent.
Each tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or click here to explore ways to reuse your tins!
﻿Click here to see all our Black Tea Blends.

name: Harney Heritage – Wrapped Sachet Tea Chest
description:
Our Harney Heritage Wrapped Sachet Sampler will soon become a classic gesture of hospitality for hosts and guests alike. Designed to convey the tradition of tea, including a map of traditional tea sourcing regions, we fill it with our choice of six Wrapped Sachet flavors, 6 packets of each flavor (36 total). Be assured that our selection will be wonderful and well received. Use and refill the chest all the time, or it's easy to store it for annual traditions.
Each chest contains 36 sachets (6 pre-selected tea flavors, 6 of each flavor) from our Wrapped Sachet Collection.

name: Bee's Knees
description: Among thousands of blend submissions and even more votes, Bees Knee's was chosen by you, our customers, to be our 2020 Blend Contest winner. This Roaring Twenteas-inspired tea, a play on the 1920's cocktail, will arouse your senses with its beautiful botanical aroma and silky smooth sweet cup.

name: Black Jasmine
description: Back by popular demand, Black Jasmine is our black tea version of a favorite floral tea. Originally, Jasmine teas were made from green or slightly oxidized (pouchong) leaves. However, we were able to source a limited amount of this black tea version from Fujian Province, China. It is difficult to find more, so get it while you can!

name: Harney & Sons Sampler – Fruit Loose Teas
description:
In Middle Europe (Germany and Austria), they have developed a great affection for fruit teas. Tantalizing blends are created over a base of apple pieces, orange peels, hibiscus, and rose hips. We then add some of our favorite fruit flavors. There are four tins per set, each with 4 ounces of caffeine-free infusions bursting with flavor. Discover and enjoy our most popular fruit teas, or introduce them to a friend.
Each sampler includes:
1 - Mango Fruit 4 oz Tin
1 - Peach Fruit 4 oz Tin
1 - Strawberry Kiwi Fruit 4 oz Tin
1 - Blood Orange 4 oz Tin

name: Death on the Nile, Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
Belgian sleuth Hercule Poirot’s Egyptian vacation aboard a glamorous river steamer turns into a terrifying search for a murderer when a picture-perfect couple’s idyllic honeymoon is tragically cut short. Set against an epic landscape of sweeping desert vistas and the majestic Giza pyramids, this tale of unbridled passion and incapacitating jealousy features a cosmopolitan group of impeccably dressed travelers and enough wicked twists and turns to leave audiences guessing until the final, shocking denouement. Sequel to the fantastic mystery (and tea), Murder on the Orient Express.﻿
Each tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or click here to explore ways to reuse your tins!

name: Celebration, Tin of 30 Sachets
description:
Based on traditional English flavors, this irresistible blend of black tea is perfect for gatherings of friends and families. Our Celebration Tea captures the magic of the seasons, especially Hanukkah. "Savor this limited edition tea anytime of the day or gift it to someone you love." – John Harney
Each tin contains 30 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or reuse it and refill it with one of our Bags of 50!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Celebration.

name: Royal Chrysanthemum
description: VeeVee supplies us with many wonderful teas from Anhui Province in Central China. This year, she showed us this big yellow chrysanthemum, which we had to buy. It looks like it could be a jewel on a royal's finger, and it tastes nice too.

name: Wild Chrysanthemum
description: Chrysanthemum flowers have long since been part of Chinese culture. The flowers are dried, and when infused, they create a bold, sweet, and tangy cup.

name: Shakespeare's Globe - A Midsummer Night's Tea, Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
What an honor, or should we write "honour!" The Globe Theatre is along the banks of the Thames in London. It is the place that honors Shakespeare and his inspiring words and plays. Now, we can raise a cup to the bard and also help sustain that theatre. This is a complex blend (should it be anything else?) of black tea with fruit flavors, spice, and flowers.
10% of the sale price will be donated to the Globe Theater, so it will be there the next time you visit London.
Each tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or click here to explore ways to reuse your tins!
As seen in the New York Times!

name: Imperial Windsor Blend
description:
Imperial Windsor is a blend that we have done for the Royal St. George Society. The RSGS is a patriotic society in England. Roses are one of the many symbols of England, and so this strong black tea has rose petals sprinkled throughout. 10% of sales will help fund the Society’s good work. 
Please note: The rose petals add a little floral flavor. This is a nice strong breakfast tea.

name: Organic Rooibos Chai, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
Organic Rooibos Chai brings together caffeine-free Organic Rooibos, or "red bush" herbal from South Africa, with sweet Indian spices of clove, cardamom, and cinnamon. Savor this blend in soothing, soul-satisfying cups. The spices impart an earthy touch that will have you welcoming seconds.
Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Organic Rooibos Chai.

name: Organic Supreme Green, HT Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
It's good to get back to basics. By popular demand, we're delighted to share our organic green tea with no added flavors, an option that's enjoyable and energizing without any extras. No fuss or frills to be found here—only the delicious, lightly sweet notes, smooth flavors, and pleasing aromas of a fine green tea. A delightful addition to your afternoon teatime, whether you take it with sugar or without.
Each HT tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or reuse it and refill it with one of our Bags of 50!

Click here to see all our Chinese Green Teas.

name: Taiping Houkui
description:
A hand-rolled style of one of China's best green teas. This spring, we visited the lakeside village that makes this special tea. It was great to see the ladies hand-roll the large leaves before they were flattened out in a press. Most Taiping Houkui is now made by machine, so it is nice to have this hand-rolled traditional green tea.
Please note: There is only one ounce per unit. We put it in a large bag to make sure the large leaves remain full.
Directions: Please put 2-3 grams (10–15 large leaves) in a heat-resistant glass or teapot, add 175º hot water, and steep for 3–4 minutes.

name: Organic Ginger Turmeric, Box of 20 Premium Teabags
description:
Organic Ginger Turmeric is a potent blend of two powerhouse roots that are sure to become a staple in your tea cabinet. We've added apple, beetroot, and lemongrass to bring an extra touch of flavor to this ruby-colored brew. Warm and soothing when brewed hot, and refreshing when served iced, you will find a sense of tranquility in every cup.
Each box contains 20 teabags.Each teabag brews one 6-8 oz. cup of tea.Each teabag is individually wrapped, making it perfect for travel or sharing with a friend!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Organic Ginger Turmeric.

name: Fresh Brew Iced Tea Sampler
description: Having trouble deciding which iced tea to order? We've taken the worry out of the equation with this sampler pack of 4 of our 3 count fresh brew iced tea cartons. In no time at all you could be sipping on Indigo Punch, Tropical Mango, Invigorating Peach, Blood Orange, letting the bright flavors refresh your palette. Contains herbal and black tea blends.

name: Heirloom Bartlett Pear, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
Heirloom Bartlett Pear tea is a fruit-filled ode to the light, sweet leaves of Mutan White tea and the crisp flavors of Bartlett pears. The silvery white and green Mutan leaves mingle with delicately succulent pieces of pear, apple and peach. The spice notes of nutmeg and two kinds of cinnamon add a touch of zing. The result is a multifaceted, beautifully layered infusion that's light and warming in every cup.
Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
Click here to see additional purchasing options of Heirloom Bartlett Pear.

name: Organic Chaga Chai – Nourish Wellness Blend
description:
Nourish your soul with our latest wellness botanical, Organic Chaga Chai. We started with wild, earthy-flavored Canadian Chaga mushrooms, then added potent spices that are known to encourage a feeling of warmth that will leave you with a healthy glow. With its strong, earthy flavors, we suggest you try it with your favorite milk or alternative milk product and a bit of honey. It makes for a great latte.
WARNING: Consult your healthcare provider prior to use if you are pregnant or nursing, taking any supplements, taking any medication, or if you have a medical condition.

name: Organic Golden Milk – Glimmer Wellness Blend
description:
Lie back and experience a chill like none other with our latest wellness botanical, Golden Milk. Made with a mixture of adaptogens and spices, let this cup bring out your inner glimmer.
Please note: This Golden Milk blend has a kick of spice.
WARNING: Consult your healthcare provider prior to use if you are pregnant or nursing, taking any medication, or if you have a medical condition.

name: Hemp Moringa – Deep Sleep Wellness Blend
description:
Unwind and enjoy deep sleep through botanical wellness with our Hemp Moringa blend. Inspired by traditional Ayurvedic beverages, this blend’s unapologetic hemp aroma and relaxing, mellow body make it perfect for true enthusiasts. Intense flavors of hemp and moringa mingle together with holy basil, bold turmeric, goji berries, and coconut for a truly one-of-a kind cup. Especially delicious with a touch of local honey!
 Please note: This tea has a strong hemp aroma.
WARNING: Consult your healthcare provider prior to use if you are pregnant or nursing, taking any medication, or if you have a medical condition.

name: Moringa Leaf
description:
An ancient herbal brew from China that has become more popular recently. Moringa leaves boast a boatload of healthful qualities as they're loaded with micronutrients. Additionally, benefits include easing digestion, immunity-boosting effects, and skin radiance. Traditionally, it has helped with sleep issues. 
WARNING: Consult your healthcare provider prior to use if you are pregnant or nursing, taking any medication, or if you have a medical condition.

name: Organic Gunpowder
description: When John Harney started in the tea trade over 30 years ago, there were just two green tea offerings from China: Gunpowder and Chun Mee. Though our selection has expanded greatly since then, many people are very familiar with and enjoy Gunpowder's sharp, charred flavor.

name: The Met Gift
description:
We've partnered with the Metropolitan Museum of Art on this unique gift set, which includes an art-inspired set of four tins, each filled with 20 sachets of a unique tea blend, all packaged nicely in a co-branded black and gold gift box.The teas included are Garden Therapy Green Herbal Tea, Hot Apple Spice Black Tea, and Taste of British History, which was specially created in honor of the reopening of The Met's renovated British Galleries in 2020.
Each gift contains:
1 - Garden Therapy Tin of 20 Sachets
1 - Hot Apple Spice Tin of 20 Sachets
1 - Royal Pomegranate Tin of 20 Sachets

 1 - Taste of British Tin of 20 Sachets

Click here to explore The Met Collection.

name: Organic Rooibos Chai
description: Organic Rooibos Chai brings together caffeine-free Organic Rooibos, or "red bush" herbal from South Africa, with sweet Indian spices of clove, cardamom, and cinnamon. Savor this blend in soothing, soul-satisfying cups. The spices impart an earthy touch that will have you welcoming seconds.

name: Mother's Day, Tin of 30 Sachets
description:
Mother's Day is a beautiful and refreshing caffeine-free herbal blend created in honor of all mothers. Our tea sachets in the decorative tins make a thoughtful gift for Mom or the perfect choice if you are hosting a Mother's Day tea or luncheon. This tea was previously known as Mother's Bouquet.
Each tin contains 30 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or reuse it and refill it with one of our Bags of 50!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Mother's Day.

name: Birthday Party, Tin of 30 Sachets
description:
We created Decaf Birthday Tea to honor Master Tea Blender John Harney on his 80th birthday. Delightfully fruity and aromatic, Birthday Tea combines luscious fruit and berry flavors with flowers and brews a beautiful crimson-colored cup of tea. Worthy of your special day, too, enjoy it served hot or iced. 
Looking for an easy gift? Grab our Birthday in a Box which comes with candles!
Each tin contains 30 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or reuse it and refill it with one of our Bags of 50!
 Click here to see additional purchasing options for Birthday Party.

name: Organic Earl Grey Supreme, Box of 50 Wrapped Teabags
description:
A blend of black teas from India, scented with natural, lemony bergamot from the Mediterranean. A perfect afternoon tea that can stand alone or be complemented with milk and sugar.
Each box contains 50 teabags.Each teabag brews one 6-8 oz. cup of tea.Each teabag is individually wrapped, making it perfect for travel or sharing with a friend!
By choosing this fair trade product, you are empowering farming communities to earn additional funds and invest them where they are most needed. Fair Trade supports safe working conditions and protects fundamental human rights.

name: Avocado Leaf
description:
For a soothing herbal infusion, give Avocado Leaf a try. We focus solely on avocado leaves to develop a luxurious cup. Our hope was to share a brew with healthy qualities, not to mention a unique taste and aroma.
WARNING: Consult your healthcare provider prior to use if you are pregnant or nursing, taking any medication, or if you have a medical condition.

name: Hemp Avocado
description:
Wake up and smell the avocado! This blend features Avocado Leaves, The Hemp Division hemp leaves, and a delicious assortment of herbs to create a fascinating infusion to strengthen your vitality. Clearly, the hemp flavors are there; however, they are tempered by the other leaves and a bit of sweetness from the coconut pieces. We can't get enough of it here at Harney!*
Please note: This tea has a strong hemp aroma.
 
WARNING: Consult your healthcare provider prior to use if you are pregnant or nursing, taking any medication or, if you have a medical condition.
*These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA (Food and Drug Administration). This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

name: Chaga Mushroom
description:
Chaga, an adaptogen that contains numerous benefits, like naturally boosting immunity, brews into a delicious and calming herbal infusion. Ours comes wild-grown in Canada and is the perfect blend for a moment of zen. It brews up into a dark, earthy-tasting cup. And we do mean earthy, so not for everyone.
To prepare Chaga Mushroom, please whisk together 1 teaspoon per 8 oz of water to create a suspension, much like with Matcha. The water should be boiling (212º F).
WARNING: Consult your healthcare provider prior to use if you are pregnant or nursing, taking any medication, or if you have a medical condition.

name: Chaga Ashwagandha
description:
For centuries, Chaga mushrooms have been used in supplements to provide rich antioxidants and naturally boost immunity. We combined wild-grown Canadian Chaga with other powerful adaptogens like Ashwagandha root and crafted a new herbal infusion. The result is an earthy, toasty blend that is perfect for a moment of self-care. It brews up into a dark, earthy-tasting cup.
WARNING: Consult your healthcare provider prior to use if you are pregnant or nursing, taking any medication, or if you have a medical condition.

description:

name: Hot Apple Spice Black Tea, Tin of 20 sachets
description:
This bright, autumnal blend bursts with the sweetness of apples ripened in the orchard. Along with cinnamon, orange peel, and ground cloves, this black tea results in a sweet, warming brew with just the right amount of spice. 
Each tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or click here to explore ways to reuse your tins!

Click here to explore The Met Collection.

name: Taste of British History Blend, Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
To honor the re-opening of the British Art galleries at the Metropolitan Museum of Art, we created custom blends. This blend stands above the rest as a mixture of black and green tea with bergamot oil. Each cup is a tribute to England's initial fascination with tea, which would be the start of flavors and renditions to come.
Each tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or click here to explore ways to reuse your tins! 


﻿Click here to explore The Met Collection.

name: Garden Therapy Herbal Tea, Tin of 20 sachets
description:
Garden Therapy Herbal consists of chamomile, peppermint, and verbena—a blend that would've been perfect for Monet as he created scenic landscapes in the late 1800s. Please enjoy this decorative, charming herbal tea, which was created in collaboration with the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
Each tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or click here to explore ways to reuse your tins! 
﻿Click here to explore The Met Collection.

name: Organic Ginger Turmeric, Box of 20 Individually Wrapped Sachets
description:
Organic Ginger Turmeric is a potent blend of two powerhouse roots that are sure to become a staple in your tea cabinet. We've added apple, beetroot, and lemongrass to bring an extra touch of flavor to this ruby-colored brew. Warm and soothing when brewed hot, and refreshing when served iced, you will find a sense of tranquility in every cup.
Each box contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each sachet is individually wrapped, making it perfect for travel or sharing with a friend!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Organic Ginger Turmeric.

name: New England Breakfast, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
An American homage to the classic Breakfast Tea, our New England Breakfast begins with a base of strong, bright-tasting black tea. Next, we infuse it with rich maple, creating a distinctly New England brew that’s creamy and warm on the palate but still full of spirit. Enjoy hot as a classic morning tea, or try iced as a refreshing dessert accompaniment.
Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for New England Breakfast.

name: Black Cask Bourbon, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
With our new Black Cask Bourbon, we set out to combine the full body and intense aromas of black tea with the rich flavors of finely aged bourbon. The result is simple and stunning: prominent bourbon notes of vanilla, caramel, and smoky oak cask layered atop a smoky black tea base. Perfect for sipping slow and steady, as a bourbon should be.
 Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Black Cask Bourbon.

name: Organic Beetroot, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
A relaxing blend that's equal parts earthy and tangy, our Beetroot tisane combines all-organic beetroot with lemongrass and lightly sweet, fragrant notes from rose hips. The balance of earthy, lightly bitter beetroot with bright lemongrass builds a caffeine-free infusion that's bursting with flavor yet soothing. Perfect for unwinding at the end of a long day or just taking a moment to recharge in the afternoon.
Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!

name: Organic Everyday Matcha
description:
Our founder, John Harney, said that he wanted to make tea an everyday luxury. This blend is from Kagoshima in the southern island of Kyushu, Japan. It is made during the second season (June and July) from the same producers as our Organic Matcha. So please enjoy it every day!
Make sure to check out all our Matcha teas!

name: Organic Turmeric
description: Turmeric is used to add warm flavor to any savory dish or bakery delight. We offer a Turmeric Powder to add to your ingredient list as you become a master at the kitchen stove.

name: Organic Ginger Powder
description: There’s no wrong way to enjoy ginger, but Ginger Powder makes it easier than ever to indulge in ginger tea anytime. With a deliciously rich aroma and a sharp zing that brightens any palate, our Ginger Powder condenses the delectable flavor and healthful benefits of whole ginger root into a convenient powdered form. Simply mix with boiling water and a swirl of organic honey to brew a tea that’s both indulgent and rejuvenating. Feeling adventurous? Try blending with your favorite black teas and spices and brewing your own unique Harney & Sons creation. Add a little kick to savory culinary dishes or enhance bakery treats. It mixes great with smoothies or lemonade too! With the same health benefits as ginger root, the powder serves as a great solution.

name: Organic Hibiscus Ginger, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
Tune up with an infusion specially designed to support your body's defenses. This organic brew combines flavors of tropical hibiscus, rosehips, apple, and powerful echinacea for an energetic, antioxidant-filled base. Add vitamin-rich lemon peel and soothing ginger root along with cooling eucalyptus, peppermint, and a sparkle of clove for a delicious tune-up.* This tea is also known as Organic Hibiscus Ginger.
 Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
WARNING: Consult your healthcare provider prior to use if you are pregnant or nursing, taking any medication, or if you have a medical condition.
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA). This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Organic Hibiscus Ginger.

name: Finest Tea Starter Kit
description:
Loose tea might seem scary, but really, it's not! We've provided a few tools to help you become a master infusiast right at your kitchen table. Scoop your tea with the perfect teaspoon into the fine-mesh strainer. This Finest kit comes with our customer favorite Hot Cinnamon Spice. You'll have everything you need to enjoy the perfect cup, and it comes packaged in our standard black and gold Harney & Sons gift box.
Each kit contains:
1 - Hot Cinnamon Spice 4 oz Tin

1 - Perfect Teaspoon
1 - Finum Fine Mesh Brew in Mug Infuser

name: Little Women Orchard House Blend, Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
Louisa May Alcott's Orchard House
In 1857, A. Bronson Alcott purchased 12 acres of land in Concord, MA. A dilapidated house dating from the mid-1600s and its outbuildings were included for free. The apple orchard on the property was extraordinary and delighted Mr. Alcott, who considered apples the most perfect food. Not surprisingly, he named this home "Orchard House."
After moving nearly two dozen times in three decades, the Alcotts finally found their anchoring place and, after extensive repairs, resided there for 20 years. Orchard House is most noted for being where Louisa May Alcott wrote and set the beloved novel Little Women in 1868 at a desk her father built for her.
Please enjoy this decorative, limited edition tea that we prepared for the release of the 2019 rendition of Little Women. 
Each tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or click here to explore ways to reuse your tins!
Click here to see all our Flavored Green Teas.

name: Harney & Sons Display Rack - Decorative Wire, for 4 Premium Teabag Boxes
description:
If you've run out of space on your shelf or in a drawer and want to display your tea collection, we have the solution for you! Made exclusively for Harney & Sons, this elegant wire rack holds four of our tea bag boxes. May be mounted to the wall or placed on your shelf or countertop.
Please note: Tea and boxes are not included.

name: Harney & Sons Reusable Bubble Tea Straws
description:
This straw is made of FDA-approved and food-safe stainless steel. It has a wider diameter (1/2 inch), which makes it great for sipping bubble tea or for those moments when you're all tea-d out and go for a milkshake or smoothie!

Contains four different colored straws in a linen bag.
Dimensions (inces): 8.5l x 0.5d
Dishwasher safe

name: Raspberry Mojito
description: The winner of our 2019 Blend Contest, our Raspberry Mojito offers a refreshing, caffeine-free brew full of bright, fruity notes. Flavors of juicy raspberry mingle on the palate with tangy, almost tart hibiscus and sweet apple, plus a squeeze of tart lime and eye-opening fresh mint. The result is a unique blend that’s equally refreshing, hot or iced.

name: Harney & Sons Bubble Tea Set
description:
Bubble Tea, Boba, or Tapioca Pearls? We'll let you decide what you want to call them, but they're all about the same: chewy treats that slide up the big straws traditionally used to sip Taiwanese bubble tea. With our Bubble Tea Set, you can enjoy them with some specially selected flavors. Try our customer favorite, Paris, or go for something a bit more traditional in a cup of Milky Oolong. Just add your choice of milk and enjoy.
Each set contains:
1 - Paris 4 oz Tin
1 - Milky Oolong 3 oz Tin

 4 - Harney & Sons Reusable Boba Straws (stainless steel/dishwasher-safe)

1 - Bag of Tapioca Pearls

name: Island Dreams
description: This blend is perfect for adding a hint of the tropics to long summer days. Island Dreams begins with a base of fine, nimble-bodied green tea. Then, layers of tangy pineapple and sweet coconut deepen the flavor, along with mellow blue cornflowers. Finally, we added rum flavor for a truly tropical infusion that’s equally delicious plain or with a spoon of honey.

name: Emerald Isles
description: Lush and bright, Emerald Isles begins with vegetal notes from the fine green tea we use for its base. The mix includes a citrus zing from real orange peel, fresh flavors of grapefruit, lemon, spearmint, and mellow red cornflowers. This luminous blend can be enjoyed as is or with your choice of sweetener to enhance the brew.

name: New England Breakfast
description: An American homage to the classic Breakfast Tea, our New England Breakfast begins with a base of strong, bright-tasting black tea. Next, we infuse it with rich maple, creating a distinctly New England brew that’s creamy and warm on the palate but still full of spirit. Enjoy hot as a classic morning tea, or try iced as a refreshing dessert accompaniment.

name: Black Cask Bourbon
description: With our new Black Cask Bourbon, we set out to combine the full body and intense aromas of black tea with the rich flavors of finely aged bourbon. The result is simple and stunning: prominent bourbon notes of vanilla, caramel, and smoky oak cask layered atop a smoky black tea base. Perfect for sipping slow and steady, as a bourbon should be.

name: Mayfair Breakfast
description: We are proud to be the tea blenders for some of London's luxury 5-star hotels. Through our relationships, we have learned the taste preferences of the British. We know they like their tea strong, and indeed, this one is! An English-style English Breakfast tea, Mayfair Breakfast, is made to be served with milk and sugar.

name: Dar-Jee-Lingside
description: Crafted in cahoots with Darlingside and Alex Harney. There is no wrong way to take this flavored Darjeeling tea with wild honeybush, lemon peel, lemon, and grapefruit flavors, but listening to Darlingside’s music helps.

name: Japanese Whisky
description: Japanese whisky has grown in popularity, so we were excited when this tea was offered to us. As whisky fans, we couldn't resist it! Japanese Whisky is a rare tea that comes to us from Shizuoka Prefecture, Japan. It's made using the same cultivar as most Senchas, Yabukita. During its extensive processing, it is finished with an 8-hour smoking over wood chips made from Japanese whisky barrels.

name: Raspberry Herbal, Box of 20 Individually Wrapped Sachets
description:
Our Raspberry Herbal tisane is a mixture of rosehips, hibiscus, orange peel, and raspberry flavor that produces a bright, great-tasting tea. It looks especially tempting when brewed in a glass teapot and served at parties. Enjoy it hot or iced. Caffeine-free.
Each box contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each sachet is individually wrapped, making it perfect for travel or sharing with a friend!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Raspberry Herbal.

name: Indigo Punch
description:
Vibrant and full of crisp, fruity flavors, our caffeine-free Indigo Punch combines the delicate tang of rose hips and apple pieces. The earthy tones of the gorgeous Butterfly Pea Flower make this a unique blend. Bright lemongrass, lemon peel, and vivid raspberry round out this beautiful brew, along with natural honey flavor for a touch of sweetness. 

Please note: The mineral content of your water source will affect the color of the brew. Our photos use local spring water sourced from the Berkshires. If the color of your brew is different, please consider trying an alternative water source.

name: Organic Earl Grey Supreme, Box of 20 Premium Teabags
description:

name: Seven Fairy
description: Seven Fairy, an exquisite flowering tea, comes with a hidden surprise. Remove it from the package, and you'd be forgiven for thinking you were brewing a plain bundle of lightly aromatic green tea. Add less than boiling water, however, and watch as the bloom unfurls into a blossom. Enjoy the gentle flavors and sweet aromas on a special occasion or as a treat after a long day.

name: Decaf Hot Cinnamon Spice, HT Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
We're happy to provide a decaffeinated rendition of our best-seller: Hot Cinnamon Spice. It features the same assertive flavors: three types of cinnamon, orange peel, and sweet cloves, with the decaf black tea base. Despite the allure, there is no sugar or added sweeteners. Enjoy it anytime!
Each HT tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or reuse it and refill it with one of our Bags of 50!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Decaf Hot Cinnamon.

name: Blueberry Green, Tin of 30 Sachets
description:
For Blueberry Green, we've artfully blended Chinese green tea with lemongrass, blueberry, and vanilla to create a brew that's sure to hit all the right notes. Delicious hot or iced.

Click here to see additional purchasing options for Blueberry Green.

name: Harney & Sons Best Sellers – 20 Count Sachets
description:
Discover and enjoy our best-selling teas, or introduce them to a friend! There are four tins per set, each with 20 sachets containing full-leaf tea. Each tea in this set contains caffeine.
Each set contains:

 1 - Hot Cinnamon Spice Classic Tin of 20 Sachets

    Our spicy best selling black tea.
1 - Earl Grey Supreme Classic Tin of 20 Sachets

1 - Paris Classic Tin of 20 Sachets
    A fruity earl grey black tea.1 - English Breakfast Classic Tin of 20 Sachets

    A classic plain black tea.

name: Gaiwan (Assorted Styles)
description:
This is a bit of a modern take on your traditional porcelain gaiwan.

Dimensions (inches): 3.75d x 3.25h
Materials: Glazed ceramic or glass.
Care: Handwash only.
Volume

Celadon: 5 oz.
Glass Gaiwan: 4.5 oz.
Hand Painted: 4.5 oz.
White Porcelain: 4 oz.

name: Butterfly Pea Flower
description:
Butterfly Pea Flower has been used for centuries in Southeast Asia and has recently been introduced to tea drinkers outside of its native area of Thailand. The flower boasts a long list of Ayurvedic properties, and people love the bright blue color and the fact that it changes color to a nice purple color when some acid (like lemon juice) is added. The cup imparts a mild, earthy flavor. 
Please note: The mineral content of your water source will affect the color of the brew. Our photos use local spring water sourced from the Berkshires. If the color of your brew is different, please consider trying an alternative water source.

name: Gaba Oolong
description:
Taiwan has been making GABA oolongs for many years. GABA stands for gamma-aminobutyric acid. GABA is a naturally occurring neurotransmitter that plays a key role in promoting relaxation, reducing stress, and allowing for better sleep, making it a sought-after choice for those seeking both flavor and wellness.
Incorporating GABA Oolong into your daily routine offers a delightful tea experience that combines traditional Taiwanese craftsmanship with modern health-conscious benefits.

name: Cherry Blossom, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
Try our Cherry Blossom blend of green teas and the vibrant flavor of plump, fragrant cherries. Inspired by an April visit to Tokyo, it's like a springtime awakening of the senses.
Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Cherry Blossom.

name: Matcha Bowls (Assorted Colors)
description:
Having the proper matcha bowl (chawan) is one of the most enjoyable elements of traditional Japanese tea. Cupping the bowl in your hands with frothy green brew in front of you, the bowl should be an expression of you! Whether you are brand new to matcha or have been whisking for a while, we've put together a selection for you to choose from!

Handmade.
Capacity: 13.5 oz.
Dishwasher safe.
Variants may occur. No two are exactly alike. May not be as pictured.

Make sure to check out all our Matcha teas!

name: Organic Matcha
description:
Our Organic Matcha comes from the southern island of Kyushu in the area around Kagoshima, Japan. It is a certified organic blend by the USDA. It is harvested in the early spring and thus has high levels of umami, though not as high as our Jobetsugi and other ceremonial grades. Organic Matcha can be consumed by itself or as a latte. Iced or hot—your call!
Make sure to check out all our Matcha teas!

name: Holiday Tea, Tin of 30 Sachets
description:
Holiday Tea, spiced with citrus, almond, clove, and cinnamon, has become a year-round favorite black tea. Delicious hot or iced, it's a wonderful addition to a holiday table, served piping hot on a cold winter morning, or anytime you crave a holiday-inspired brew. 
Each HRP tin contains 30 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or reuse it and refill it with one of our Bags of 50!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Holiday Tea

name: Kangra Kahwa
description: For over 8 years, Alex Harney has been traveling to the Himalayas to coach ice hockey with The Hockey Foundation. After practices and games, Kashmiri Kahwa was served and enjoyed, and this is our take on that experience. We used Kangra tea from the Himachal Pradesh region in India, which lends a unique taste as a base tea, and then added cinnamon, cardamom, cloves, safflowers, and almond flavor. This tea can be enjoyed as is, but for a more traditional experience, sweeten and serve with crushed almonds. 50% of sales go to support The Hockey Foundation’s programs.

name: Lao Ban Zhang Pu-Erh
description: This 96 g. cake was manufactured in the Manwei Village of Menghai, Xishuangbanna, in Yunnan Province. It’s rare to find a cake this small, as most Pu-Erh cakes are 357 g. The smaller size will let you get a sense of the wonderful flavors Pu-Erh can offer without committing to too much tea! This Pu-Erh is Sheng style. Sheng Pu-Erh is differentiated from shou Pu-Erh in that it can ferment naturally over time, given the right conditions.

name: Chocolate Chai Supreme, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
Our Chocolate Chai Supreme combines the flavors of a classic chai with rich chocolate and vanilla. We begin with a base of blended Chinese and Indian black teas, then add all the necessities for a delicious chai: ginger root, cardamom seeds and pods, cinnamon (ground and in chips), and nutmeg. Finally, we swirl natural chocolate, cardamom, and vanilla flavors through the blend, creating a one-of-a-kind tea experience you won’t soon forget.
Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Chocolate Chai Supreme.

name: Hot Apple Spice, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
This bright, autumnal blend bursts with the sweetness of apples ripened in the orchard. Along with cinnamon, orange peel, and ground cloves, this black tea results in a sweet, warming brew with just the right amount of spice. 

Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Hot Apple Spice.

name: Royal Palace
description:
Royal Palace tea is a lovely blend of black tea with notes of lemon and grapefruit. Featured in our Historic Royal Palaces Collection is a traditional tin design.
Historic Royal Palaces is an independent charity that looks after the Tower of London, Hampton Court Palace, the Banqueting House, Kensington Palace, and Hillsborough Castle and Gardens.

name: Chocolate Chai Supreme
description: Our Chocolate Chai Supreme combines the flavors of a classic chai with rich chocolate and vanilla. We begin with a base of blended Chinese and Indian black teas, then add all the necessities for a delicious chai: ginger root, cardamom seeds and pods, cinnamon (ground and in chips), and nutmeg. Finally, we swirl natural chocolate, cardamom, and vanilla flavors through the blend, creating a one-of-a-kind tea experience you won’t soon forget.

name: Chamomile, Box of 18 Individually Wrapped Sachets
description:
Harney & Sons sources the finest Egyptian chamomile flowers from Egypt. The result? A premium herbal tea with a light body that is perfect for winding down during a hectic afternoon at the office or at home at the end of the day. This tea is also known as Egyptian Chamomile in selected packaging.
Each box contains 18 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each sachet is individually wrapped, making it perfect for travel or sharing with a friend!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Chamomile.

name: Hot Apple Spice
description: This bright, autumnal blend bursts with the sweetness of apples ripened in the orchard. Along with cinnamon, orange peel, and ground cloves, this black tea results in a sweet, warming brew with just the right amount of spice.

name: Hot Cinnamon Spice, Classic Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
Our most popular flavored tea worldwide, Hot Cinnamon Spice, is an assertive blend of black teas, three types of cinnamon, orange peel, and sweet cloves, with no sugar added. This tea is also known as Hot Cinnamon Sunset. They are the same tea. The name varies only in certain packaging.
Each Classic tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or reuse it and refill it with one of our Bags of 50!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Hot Cinnamon Spice.

name: Earl Grey Supreme,  Classic Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
For the connoisseur, we offer Earl Grey Supreme, which uses a higher grade of tea with the addition of silver tips. Most of our customers never go back to our regular Earl Grey once they taste the Supreme. If you love bergamot and fine tea, this is the blend for you! 
Each Classic tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or reuse it and refill it with one of our Bags of 50!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Earl Grey Supreme.

name: Decaf Hot Cinnamon
description:
We're happy to provide a decaffeinated rendition of our best-seller: Hot Cinnamon Spice. It features the same assertive flavors: three types of cinnamon, orange peel, and sweet cloves, with the decaf black tea base. Despite the allure, there is no sugar or added sweeteners. Enjoy it anytime!
Historic Royal Palaces is an independent charity that looks after the Tower of London, Hampton Court Palace, the Banqueting House, Kensington Palace, Kew Palace and Hillsborough Castle and Gardens. 
Looking to try something new? Check out all our Cinnamon Spiced Teas.

name: Mist of Kawane
description: Kawane is on the way up to the Japanese Alps. This region is where one our most popular Sencha comes from, Scent of Mountains. The elevation makes the difference. Mist is destined to be as popular.

name: Duck Rice Genmaicha
description: This Genmaicha is a mixture of green tea and the fat grains of brown rice. The ducks in the rice fields from where this rice is sourced seem to love the kernels, and we think you will love the blend.

name: Ground Hojicha
description: If you like Matcha, this might be an interesting alternative. You make it similarly: Add one or two scoops into a bowl and whisk it into a foam. Many people enjoy the roasted tea stem flavors. Hojicha, a Japanese specialty, contains roasted twigs from some of the best tea gardens in Uji. One of the joys of Japanese food stores is the smell of fresh, roasted Hojicha. It is reminiscent of coffee, but sweeter.

name: Organic Jasmine
description: Looking for a tasty, organic option for your tea collection? Look no further than our Organic Jasmine! Enjoy the delicate and fragrant flavors of jasmine in every sip. Certified organic, so you can enjoy each sip with confidence and comfort.

name: Organic Ginger Lemon
description: Our Organic Ginger Lemon is simple and understated, yet full of warming flavors. It is perfect for enjoying anytime, from cloudy mornings and rainy afternoons to golden evenings in the cool. This tea combines the spicy and sweet notes of ginger and ginger root with a twist of lemon for brightness, creating a simple but full body that's easy to enjoy. Caffeine-free.

name: Organic Lemon Balm Chamomile, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
Drift off on sleep's swift wings and lullaway with a cup of Organic Lemon Balm Chamomile on the nightstand. Flavors of organic nutmeg and spearmint layer atop a sleep-enhancing blend of lavender, a gentle zing from lemon balm, and earthy organic chamomile for a warming infusion that's delicious both plain and sweetened. Pair with a crunchy biscuit for dunking or a drizzle of honey, and sip from your favorite mug in the evening before bed.*
 Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
WARNING: Consult your healthcare provider prior to use if you are pregnant or nursing, taking any medication, or if you have a medical condition.
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA). This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

name: Organic Milk Thistle Mint, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
An exquisite yet cleansing blend of five organic herbs, Organic Milk Thistle Mint features the delectable, caffeine-free combination of smooth, herbal milk thistle and sweet, somewhat mapley fenugreek. An ideal brew after a meal to aid you as you digest. Add in a dash of lively, organic ginger and nutty-floral coriander to the blend, along with a twist of refreshing peppermint, and brew to your liking for a clean, fresh infusion that tastes as good as it makes you feel.*
 Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
WARNING: Consult your healthcare provider prior to use if you are pregnant or nursing, taking any medication, or if you have a medical condition.
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA). This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

name: Golden Monkey
description: Golden Monkey tea comes from the north in China's Fujian province. It features large black tea leaves interspersed with golden tips. It produces a lightly sweet and 'round' cup of tea with a nice level of complexity. You'll enjoy the hints of apricot, nuts, and rose.

name: Angiogenesis Foundation Green Tea, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
The Angiogenesis Foundation is a non-profit organization helping people lead healthier, longer lives through angiogenesis-based treatment and prevention.

The Angiogenesis Foundation Green Tea has a delicate, soft flavor with a subtle floral essence, perfect for everyday enjoyment. This tea is hand-picked and hand-rolled from select Chinese and Japanese green tea leaves that are shown to be anti-angiogenic (cancer-starving). According to the Angiogenesis Foundation, drinking green tea has numerous health benefits.
For more information about how green tea can protect your health, visit the Angiogenesis Foundation’s Eat to Beat information hub. 
Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Angiogenesis Green Tea.

name: Dark Tibet Tea
description:
From a tea garden in YaAn, Sichuan, China, this tea is known as a tribute to Emperors! In the year 641, during the Tang Dynasty, when Princess Wencheng married Songtsan Gambo, she brought the tribute of dark tea into ancient Tibet. After that, the tea became a vital drink for Tibetan people.
Since it is produced in YaAn, it is also called YaAn Tibetan Tea. This dark tea is the only tea proven by historical events to have made great contributions to national solidarity, border stability, and national unity!

name: Venetian Tiramisu, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
Indulge your senses in the flavors of Venetian Tiramisu tea. Evocative and romantic, each cup begins with a blend of delicately floral  Mutan White tea and toasty Japanese  Hojicha. Swirling flavors of cocoa and vanilla layer throughout the tea, accented with cocoa nibs and just a hint of brandy flavor. The result is a shimmering, deliciously complex infusion that summons up visions of Venice with every sip.
Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for Venetian Tiramisu.

name: AOH Hibernian Blend, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
A premium Irish Breakfast tea benefiting the Ancient Order of Hibernians. The Ancient Order of Hibernians has helped their fellow Irish in America for many years. They commissioned this tea as a way to raise money for this worthy cause. The AOH will receive a portion of the sales of this tea to help further their charitable and scholarship programs. The tea that is most drunk in Ireland comes from Kenya, so we developed a strong tea from two tea estates in Kenya. It can handle the milk and sugar that most Irish like to add. Slainte!
 Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for AOH Hibernian Blend.

name: SGS Special English Breakfast, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
We created Special English Breakfast, a strong blend of black teas from India, Sri Lanka, and Kenya, in association with the St. George’s Society of New York. Founded in 1770, the Society provides vital support to people in need across New York’s five boroughs and serves as one of America’s oldest charities. A portion of the proceeds from each purchase of this tea supports their charitable endeavors, including protecting seniors at risk of homelessness, enabling low-income students to complete their college education, and helping families affected by pediatric cancer. For more information on the Society’s work, please visit www.stgeorgessociety.org
Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for SGS Special English Breakfast.

name: 2015 Nuo Mi Pu-Erh
description:
We're excited to offer this Tuo-cha (bird's nest) Pu-Erh. Most of the time, we buy full cakes of Pu-Erhs and break them apart when we put them into tins. Each tin of the Nuo Mi Pu-Erh contains 22 tuo-chas. Please use 1 per cup of tea and enjoy how the flavor develops over multiple infusions. This Pu-Erh is a Shou style. 
Shou (ripe) Pu-Erhh is differentiated from sheng (raw) Pu-Erh in that it is fermented before it is packaged, compressed, and sold for consumption.
Pu-Erhs often have a earthy flavor, unlike other teas. Some people love them, but some do not.

name: Organic Ginger Lemon, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
Our Organic Ginger Lemon is simple and understated, yet full of warming flavors. It is perfect for enjoying anytime, from cloudy mornings and rainy afternoons to golden evenings in the cool. This tea combines the spicy and sweet notes of ginger and ginger root with a twist of lemon for brightness, creating a simple but full body that's easy to enjoy. Caffeine-free.
Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
Click here to see additional purchasing options of Organic Ginger Lemon.

name: Havakai Frost Tea
description: This tea comes from the mountain of Nilgiris in Southern India. Although this area is in the tropics, the mountain's elevation makes for cold nights. So, the tea plant grows very slowly, and the flavor is concentrated. Highly withered and lightly oxidized, this tea creates a bright, brisk cup.

name: Berry Young
description: Light yet bursting with flavors, Berry Young exults in the gentle grassy notes and floral aroma of Mutan White tea blended with Strawberry Kiwi Fruit Tea. A natural strawberry kiwi flavor adds a touch of depth that's both tart and sweet; lastly, the addition of goji berries and rose petals enhances the fresh, warming layers of the infusion—a perfect companion to a bright morning and clear breeze.

name: Venetian Tiramisu
description: Indulge your senses in the flavors of Venetian Tiramisu tea. Evocative and romantic, each cup begins with a blend of delicately floral Mutan White tea and toasty Japanese Hojicha. Swirling flavors of cocoa and vanilla layer throughout the tea, accented with cocoa nibs and just a hint of brandy flavor. The result is a shimmering, deliciously complex infusion that summons up visions of Venice with every sip.

name: Heirloom Bartlett Pear
description: Heirloom Bartlett Pear tea is a fruit-filled ode to the light, sweet leaves of Mutan White tea and the crisp flavors of Bartlett pears. The silvery white and green Mutan leaves mingle with delicately succulent pieces of pear, apple, and peach. Spice notes of nutmeg and two kinds of cinnamon add a touch of zing. The result is a multifaceted, beautifully layered infusion that's light and warming in every cup.

name: Mulled Plum Cider
description: Rich in warm spices, Mulled Plum Cider is packed full of flavor. Plum and apple pieces are enhanced with spicy ginger and cinnamon to draw out their natural essence. The smoky flavor of cardamom pods and whole cloves pamper this rooibos-based tea. If you’ve ever enjoyed a night beside a flame accompanied by a hot spiced tea like this one, then you’ve truly known joy. The rich flavor and color mixed with just a splash of milk make for a marvelous dessert.

name: New York Blend, Tin of 20 Sachets
description:
A calming infusion fit to defuse city strife, our New York Blend is a deliciously fragrant brew designed to ease the mind and delight the senses. We combined relaxing chamomile, soothing ginger root, and refreshing peppermint for a caffeine-free tisane. Ideal for starting or ending a busy day, this blend pairs nicely with biscuits or cookies as part of a tea tray. 
Each tin contains 20 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Be sure to recycle your tin, or click here to explore ways to reuse your tins!
﻿Click here to see all our Herbal blends.

name: Organic Ginger Turmeric
description: Organic Ginger Turmeric is a potent blend of two powerhouse roots that are sure to become a staple in your tea cabinet. We've added apple, beetroot, and lemongrass to bring an extra touch of flavor to this ruby-colored brew. Warm and soothing when brewed hot, and refreshing when served iced, you will find a sense of tranquility in every cup. Rejuvenate with this herbal infusion. Caffeine-free.

name: American Buzz, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
Wake up and smell the Yaupon. Our American Buzz is made from a timeless blend of the three caffeinated hollies for an All-American brew that's sure to put a little spring in your step. We began with Yaupon from a Texas ranch, blending it with rustic, earthy Guayusa holly from Ecuador, Brazilian shade-grown Yerba Mate, and a bright twist of Spearmint from Washington for tang. This is one brew you'll want to drink sitting down.
Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!
Click here to see additional purchasing options for American Buzz.

name: Victorian London Fog, Bag of 50 Sachets
description:
Victorian London Fog was the first winning blend in our customer creation contest! Thousands of blends were submitted, and we let you all choose between the top 5 flavors! The beverage called London Fog originated during the Victorian era. Traditionally, it is an Earl Grey served with steamed milk. 
Each bag contains 50 tea sachets.Each sachet brews one 12 oz. cup of tea.Each bag is resealable to keep your tea fresh!

description:
Our finest organic black tea is a bold cup. The blend is exceptional and delicious, whether on its own or served with milk or sugar. A staple for tea connoisseurs and novices alike!
